name: netlify-pulse-dashboard
description: This is a live demo of Pulse Dashboard

scripts.build: npx generate-trend && if [ -d node_modules/pulse-dashboard/.next ]; then cp -r node_modules/pulse-dashboard/.next .; fi && if [ -f node_modules/pulse-dashboard/next.config.ts ]; then cp node_modules/pulse-dashboard/next.config.ts .; fi && if [ -d node_modules/pulse-dashboard/public ]; then cp -r node_modules/pulse-dashboard/public .; fi
